title: BallotDecryption
description: A decryption of an encrypted ballot that was spoiled.

SelectionDecryption.description: The decryption of the selection, including the encrypted message, the decrypted message, the decryption shares, and the cleartext.

encrypted_message.description: The encrypted message of the selection (the one or zero).

decrypted_message.description: The decrypted message of the selection.

shares.description: The decryption shares `M_i` used to compute the decryption `M`.

cleartext.description: The actual value encrypted, so either a zero or a one.
